title: Spice Rub
ingredients: 1 tablespoon habanero chile powder (or substitute another, less spicy, chile powder)
instructions: Combine all the ingredients in a jar, twist the cap on air tight and shake to mix well.  Store away from heat and light for up to 6 months.
yield: Makes about 1 cup, enough for 6 to 8 pounds of meat, poultry, or seafood.
